data.actual_result: Emoji picker cuts off the third dot
data.expected_result: Emoji picker doesn't overlap the ellipses
data.short_description: Emoji picker button overlaps ellipses on long names in dms
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a DM with someone who has a long enough name the emoji picker shortens it to ellipses - Observe the placement of the emoji picker with the third dot
